name: I've heard this music before [game jam]
name_original: I've heard this music before [game jam]
description:
Try to survive in a random generated apocalypse world; where bombs appears on top of your head; walls shrinks; lava fluids underground; and most important, where your time is running out.

Try to survive as long, as you can (hint: there's a trick... but it's really hard)

Controls:

WASD - Moving

Space - Jumping

Left Mouse - Destroy block

Right Mouse - Place Stone (to survive a little longer)

Enjoy!

This game participated in Game Jam - Mini Jam 100: Overload

Credits: Thanks for all for sharing code. Music is: Sharp - Jeremy Korpas and Spring Thaw - Asher Fulero.
